pkgmetadata.longdescription: # alt:V Masterlist for PythonYou can use this Package to interface with the alt:V master list API and with the altstats.net API.# Install ```pip install altvmasterlist``` or ```pip3 install altvmasterlist```# Usage```from altvmasterlist import masterlist as altv...or...from altvmasterlist import altstats as altv```# DocsPlease see the Docs [here](https://nickwasused.github.io/altv-python-masterlist/).
